item.title: Reboot
item.description: I spent most of my career writing code - mostly Ruby on Rails and Objective-C, and in the last few years I’ve been mostly in Engineering Management, which means writing less code and managing people and strategy more. But thanks to extra time and headspace introduced by COVID-19 related #StayHome social distancing and lockdown measures (aka Circuit Breaker if you’re in ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬), I’ve taken the opportunity to bring myself up to date and rekindle my relationship with writing and deploying code.

item.title: Jinny Wong
item.description: Hi, I am Jinny Wong (sometimes I also go by my married surname, Lo; other times, I go by my Chinese name, ShÅ« JÇn) â€” I’m an Engineering Manager/Software Engineer based in the sunny island of Singapore ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¬ I mostly code in Objective-C and Swift, Ruby on Rails, and some (non-React) JavaScript. I’m also attempting to pick up some Go. These days, I mostly manage engineers and engineering strategy. I am also a fountain pen and general writing instruments geek, you may see me occasionally write about pens, paper and ink ğŸ–‹
